void util( long long *arr, int size, int idx, char ops[], long long *min_val );

Now implementing the 'util' function as:

void util(long long arr[], int size, int idx, char ops[], long long *min_val) {

    if (idx ==3) {
        *min_val =  (arr[0] < *min_val) ? arr[0] : *min_val;
        return;
    }

    // Now, iterate all possible i and j pairs
    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
        for (int j = i+1; j < size; j++) {

            // Make a new array of size (size-1)
            int new_size = size -1;
            long long new_arr[new_size]; // VLA
            int idx_new = 0;

            // copy elements except i and j
            for (int k =0; k < size; k++) {
                if (k != i && k != j) {
                    new_arr[idx_new++] = arr[k];
                }
            }

            // compute result for operator
            long long res;
            if ( idx <3 && (ops[idx] == '+' ) ) {
                res = arr[i] + arr[j];
            } else {
                res = arr[i] * arr[j];
            }
            // add to new array
            new_arr[idx_new] = res; // since idx_new = size-2, so new size is (size-1)
            // now recurse
            util(new_arr, new_size, idx +1, ops, min_val );
        }
    }
    // no return here: only exit at base case
}

Now, code presentation:

Now, putting all together.

We also have to include the necessary headers: 'stdio.h' and 'limits.h'.

The code:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <limits.h>

void util(long long arr[], int size, int idx, char ops[], long long *min_val);

int main() {
    long long arr[4], min_val = LLONG_MAX;
    for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
        scanf("%lld", &arr[i]);
    }
    char ops[3];
    for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        scanf(" %c", &ops[i]);
    }
    util(arr, 4, 0, ops, &min_val);
    printf("%lld\n", min_val);
    return 0;
}

void util(long long arr[], int size, int idx, char ops[], long long *min_val) {
    if (idx == 3) {
        if (arr[0] < *min_val) {
            *min_val = arr[0];
        }
        return;
    }
    
    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
        for(int j = i + 1; j < size; j++) {
            int new_size = size - 1;
            long long new_arr[new_size];
            int idx_new = 0;
            
            for (int k = 0; k < size; k++) {
                if (k != i && k != j) {
                    new_arr[idx_new++] = arr[k];
                }
            }
            
            long long res = (ops[idx] == '+') ? (arr[i] + arr[j]) : (arr[i] * arr[j]);
            new_arr[idx_new] = res;
            
            util(new_arr, new_size, idx +1, ops, min_val);
        }
    }
}
